attributes.action: Admit failure and  to withdraw completely from political life after his resignation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given the mess the P.M and former chancellor has made of the economy [aka Freddie Goodwin]On his retirement from P.M [or ousting] he should forego any financial benefits from taking part in public life and should withdraw from the political scene .
He has assisted in upsetting the UK economy by his irresponsible policies and should not be rewarded for failure

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
